abstract: Ian Hannam, JPMorgan’s global chairman of equity capital markets, left the bank after British financial regulators fined him for disclosing inside information.
snippet: Ian Hannam, JPMorgan’s global chairman of equity capital markets, left the bank after British financial regulators fined him for disclosing inside information.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — One of the top bankers at JPMorgan Chase in London resigned on Tuesday.

headline.main: A Top London Banker at JPMorgan Chase Resigns
